title: XDA Basics: How to connect Apple AirPods to your Windows 11 PC in 60 seconds
content:
The AirPods Pro are solid wireless earbuds with active noise cancellation (ANC). They are water resistant and support streaming Spatial Audio while tracking head movements. They make sense the most if you’re already in Apple’s ecosystem — as you get to take advantage of additional features, such as instant pairing and automatic device switching. However,

The post XDA Basics: How to connect Apple AirPods to your Windows 11 PC in 60 seconds appeared first on XDA.
description: The AirPods Pro work best with Apple products. However, you can still connect them to a Windows 11 PC. Here's how to do so,
